Address.label: Address
Address.value: DELAUNAYS ROAD, BLACKLEY,MANCHESTER TECHNOLOGY CENTER, HEXAGON TOWER, MANCHESTER, M9 8GQ, United Kingdom

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SmartKem Inc focuses on the design, development, industrialization, and technology transfer of low temp, solution-deposited organic semiconductors for transistor backplanes. The company derives revenue from the sale of demonstration products.
